column1: I don’t see many people annoyed with it being called Wuhan. The problem is calling it Chinese virus when the official name is Coronavirus. Whenever someone calls it the Chinese virus, a bunch of racist shitheads comment ignorant stuff. Plus hate crime is going up amongst Asians.
